\n \n \n \n Sencha Touch 2 Release Notes\n \n \n \n \n

\n Sencha Touch 2 - JavaScript Framework\n

\n \n
\n \n

\n Release Notes for Sencha Touch 2.1.0\n

\n \n

\n Release Notes: Release Notes: November 6, 2012
\n Version Number: 2.1.0\n

\n \n
    \n
  • Enhancements/Changes\n
      \n
    • Improved docs for Ext.Component#add param type
      • \n
    • Make Ext.Loader#setPath 2nd param optional in documentation
      • \n
    • Document CompositeElement as having all Element methods
      • \n
    • Added Chart Marker documentation
      • \n
    • Added moving average to Stock Example
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3565] Allow legend chart binding via name
      • \n
    • Updated documentation for Ext.feature, Ext.browser, Ext.os
      • \n
    • [VJET-226] Make Ext.app.Application#getController method public
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3580] Allow associationKey to map to nested data
      • \n
    • Changed behavior of Store to not sync the existing records as being removed when reloading the Store with new records
      • \n
    • Updated documentation for the Ext.draw.Color static methods
      • \n
    • Added device.Contacts method descriptions into abstract interface and moved config from implementation class into abstract
      • \n
    • Added missing Card Layout documentation back in
      • \n
    • Native Contacts API is now public and available
      • \n
    • Improved the packager.json documentation for native builds
      • \n
    \n
    • \n \n
  • Bug Fixes\n
      \n
    • [TOUCH-3558] Fixed labelAlign of fields with left and right alignment
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3570] Fixed dynamic grouping within a List
      • \n
    • Fixed docs for Ext#application parameters
      • \n
    • Fixed Select#store cfg type documentation
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3577] Fixed issue with loadMask indicator being set to false
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3547] Fixed issue with visibleRange where it could ge into an infinite loop when being passed bad parameters
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3530] Fixed issue with legend interaction in KitchenSink example
      • \n
    • Fixed @cfg docs in Ext.util.Grouper
      • \n
    • [VJET-232] Fixed type of Application#requires config
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3572] Fixed issue with orientationchange event on Chrome Mobile
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3573] Fixed an issue where goToNode would not show the correct list when called from within a detail card
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3475] Fixed issue with header overlap in a list on Android
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3582] Fixed iOS6 simulator detection
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3583] Fixed an issue where anyMatch wasn\'t respected on filters in the SQL proxy
      • \n
    • Fixed an initial jump of bar chart
      • \n
    • Fixed type definition of Ext.dataview.NestedList#store
      • \n
    • Fixed gradients being added to a series
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3494] Fixed issue with native packager in Windows related to code signing
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3579] Fixed some issues related to updating records in a list that is hidden
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-1176] Fixed issue where prepareData wasn\'t used in a List
      • \n
    • Fixed Floating point rounding error for Canvas
      • \n
    \n
    • \n \n
  • Known Issues / Upcoming Changes\n
      \n
    • Android 4.1 (Jellybean) has issues with\n clearing it\'s graphics buffer when using Canvas. We are forcing our SVG implementation on this specific version of Android.
      • \n
    \n
    • \n

\n Release Notes for Sencha Touch 2.1.0-rc2\n

\n \n

\n Release Notes: Release Notes: October 12, 2012
\n Version Number: 2.1.0-rc2\n

\n
\n

We are now preparing for the final GA release of Touch 2.1. Until then we will be\n focusing on bug fixing, documentation, and performance tweaks.

\n

A DOM change was made to ListItems to improve performance by removing a level\n of box nesting. If you use a header with a custom height you will need to set\n that height in the sass For example:\n

\n 

\n
                .x-list-normal {\n
                  &.x-list-grouped .x-list-header-wrap .x-dock-horizontal {\n
                      padding-top: 26px;\n
                  }\n
                }\n
\n

\n In addition if you were targeting ".x-list-item .x-dock-vertical", this will change to\n ".x-list-item .x-dock-horizontal".\n

\n
\n \n
    \n
  • Enhancements/Changes\n
      \n
    • Change ListItems to not use vertical docking for headers. This improves performance since there is less DOM and less box layouts
      • \n
    • SVG is now forced on Android 4.1 devices due to Canvas issues
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3543] Added chart axis minZoom and maxZoom configurations
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3508] Added `action` to bubbleEvents on text field
      • \n
    • Added in missing chart documentation for engine, modifiers, chart, series sprites, labels, grid, axis, interactions, and more
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3551] Added filtering and sorting capabilities to the SQL proxy
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3554] Make sure NestedList creates a TreeStore when you specify an object for its store config
      • \n
    • Ensure the processed records are applied to the ResultSet in Operation
      • \n
    • Changed the way native package view controllers switch (on iOS), now we use window.controller property instead of using "addView", this is required by iOS 6
      • \n
    \n
    • \n \n
  • Bug Fixes\n
      \n
    • [TOUCH-3243] Fixed alignment of message in load mask
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3531] Fixed issues with the zIndex of the chart watermark
      • \n
    • Fixed many the trailing comma warnings for production builds
      • \n
    • Fixed chart Highlight dependency
      • \n
    • Fixed improper popup syntax for chart interactions
      • \n
    • Fixed example icons and added chart examples to the Documentation
      • \n
    • Fixed update/new tags for 2.1 and the documentation should now properly be tagged for 2.1
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3480] Fixed removeAll on TreeStore
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3553, TOUCH-3196, TOUCH-3041] Fixed hard error with multitouch on Android 4.0.x devices
      • \n
    • Fixed destroy method on chart\'s animation modifier which could cause charts to stop responding when animations were interrupted
      • \n
    • Fixed touchstart detection on BlackBerry 6
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3535] Fixed webview detection when running inside an iOS UIWebView
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-2997] Fixed issue with date picker days
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3564] Fixed Ext.Anim to use Ext.define instead of extend
      • \n
    • Fixed builder issue with generation of delta file
      • \n
    • Fixed builder issue with incorrect alias generation
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3559] Fixed native purchases model typo
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3562] Fixed issue with sencha generate app corrupting binary template files
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3486] Fixed issue where List items weren\'t being properly updated when refreshing a hidden list
      • \n
    • Fixed native package error when signing application on Mac
      • \n
    • Fixed native package webview layout (+/- 20px on top)
      • \n
    • Fixed native package modal viewcontrollers layout
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3569] Fixed error where adding google maps to app.json causing build to fail
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3562] Fixed sencha generate app corrupting binary template files
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3245] Fixed issue with Command not forcing compass to compile scss and ignore cache files
      • \n
    \n
    • \n \n
  • Known Issues / Upcoming Changes\n
      \n
    • Android 4.1 (Jellybean) has issues with\n clearing it\'s graphics buffer when using Canvas. We are forcing our SVG implementation on this specific version of Android.
      • \n
    \n
    • \n
\n

\n Release Notes for Sencha Touch 2.1.0-rc1\n

\n \n

\n Release Notes: Release Notes: October 3, 2012
\n Version Number: 2.1.0-rc1\n

\n
\n

We are now preparing for the final GA release of Touch 2.1. Until then we will be\n focusing on bug fixing, documentation, and performance tweaks.

\n
\n \n
    \n
  • Enhancements/Changes\n
      \n
    • Added linearGradient support in SVG Engine
      • \n
    • Added Radar Chart support
      • \n
    • Added Gauge Chart support
      • \n
    • Added Plot Chart support
      • \n
    • Added item events to charts
      • \n
    • Updated generate app to test for linux and skip call to native packager for that platform
      • \n
    • Added Highlight interaction to charts
      • \n
    • Added padding config to labels in an axis
      • \n
    • Added performance enhancements for Android Translations and Scrolling
      • \n
    • Added better support or requestAnimationFrame for the TaskQueue
      • \n
    • Added Legend support added for charts
      • \n
    • ComponentManager now unregisters itself on destroy after it\'s superclass is called instead of before
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3484] Ext.feature.has.LocalStorage added
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3483] Added series renderers to bar series
      • \n
    • POST calls will now honor the disableCache option
      • \n
    • Chrome Mobile will now use the Default Viewport
      • \n
    • Added cache buster for Native bridge for iOS
      • \n
    • Removed user-scalable meta tag as it detrimental on Android reference
      • \n
    • Updated sencha-ant.xml to add sencha.jar to the classpath of the current project instance
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3397] Removed extra css animation from Android 2 in Pull To Refresh
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3497] Added support for iPhone 5 resolution startup screen
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3509] Call evented constructor in the Store constructor. This ensures initialize is being called
      • \n
    • Verbose output flag added to sencha command; -debug or --debug at the end of command line for stbuild
      • \n
    \n
    • \n \n
  • Bug Fixes\n
      \n
    • [TOUCH-3106] Fixed an issue where calling the belongsTo setter wouldn\'t remove the record from the old belongsTo store, and not clear the belongsToInstance
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-2949] Fixed an issue where the record wouldn\'t be updated on the DataItem because we were calling updateRecord directly
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3222] Fixed an issue where a filtered item wouldn\'t be removed from the map in the Collection
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3182] Fixed an issue where reloading a store with data that included associated data didn\'t update those associations
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3447] Fixed layout flex issue with Toolbar when having a title and items on the same Toolbar
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3173] Fixed an issue where the filter function passed to filterBy would not be passed the promised arguments
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3463] Fixed dropdown zIndex for Android 4
      • \n
    • Fixed config.rb template
      • \n
    • Fixed \'sdk\' path hard-coding to use template variable {frameworkPath}
      • \n
    • Fixed sass regeneration issues by adding .default extension
      • \n
    • Fixed issue with adding a load mask to a non-rendered DataView/List
      • \n
    • Fixed issue with having a list with no store initially defined
      • \n
    • Fixed an issue with dynamically loading identifiers for associations
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3475] Fixed header to be not on top of index bar in List
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3472] Fixed leftmost item truncation in bar charts
      • \n
    • Fixed scrolling performance on Android while dragging an item
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3486] Fixed an issue where itemHeights would be incorrect if the list was refreshed or updated while the list was hidden
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3360] Fixed Chrome Mobile detection
      • \n
    • Fixed iPhone 5 meta when adding to the home screen (no width tag added)
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3473, TOUCH-3457] Fixed issue with Carousel not animating properly due to javascript\'s typeof NaN == \'number\'...
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3373] Fixed issue which prevented the erased event from firing on a component
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3387] Fixed issue with DatePickerField accepting focus
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3416] Fixed issues with being able to properly destroy a media based component
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3501] Fixed bug in SVG path parsing
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3506, TOUCH-3507] Fixed Function.createBuffered argument handling
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3478] Fixed extra 6px padding on floating panels which were sized
      • \n
    • Fixed apple.scss warning
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3502] Fixed performance issue for radio fields
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3212] Fixed some filename issues with some example icons
      • \n
    • Fixed native packager issues with iOS6
      • \n
    • Fixed orientation change on iOS6
      • \n
    \n
    • \n \n
  • Known Issues / Upcoming Changes\n
      \n
    • Android 4.1 (Jellybean) has some issues with clearing it\'s graphics buffer when canvas is resized. We will have a workaround before the GA release
      • \n
    • Examples are still being polished for all devices
      • \n
    \n
    • \n
\n
\n \n

\n Release Notes for Sencha Touch 2.1.0-b3\n

\n \n

\n Release Notes: Release Notes: September 10, 2012
\n Version Number: 2.1.0-b3\n

\n
\n

\n The new List component is included with this release. This implementation replaces the old\n one for lists and is no longer bound one-to-one between a store and DOM elements. This means that\n the length of the list will no longer have a bearing on it\'s scrolling performance. In addition,\n lists can use components if you specify them with an itemConfig and itemTpl will be converted\n to an itemConfig dynamically if you specify one. Due to these changes, the DOM structure was altered\n for lists and you may need to change some css selectors to add appropriate styling for your lists.\n Typically you need to change the selector from \'.x-list-item\' to \'.x-list-item > .x-dock-vertical > .x-dock-body\'\n for any padding or margins you may have added. We have change the TouchTweets example from using a\n component based DataView to the new List very easily and should be a good example of using the\n new List component with dynamic large lists.\n

\n

\n We are releasing an update to Sencha Command and the Native Packager. This includes many bugfixes and\n enhancements including:\n

    \n
  • in-app purchases API for iOS
    • \n
  • Contacts APIs for iOS and Android
    • \n
  • Push notifications for iOS
    • \n
  • openURL support
    • \n
\n The Native packages are also now plugin based and includes an API for developers to write their own\n plugins.\n

\n

\n We continue to add more to charting, and this release includes some of the labeling, grouped bar charts,\n axis titles, and more. We want the next release for charting to be feature complete so expect the last chart types\n and missing functionality to be added soon.\n

\n

\n Once again, thank you for all the reported issues, we have fixed many bugs for this release and\n continue to work hard on them. The major changes are now in place and we are continuing to work on\n performance enhancements and bug fixes until the release is ready.\n

\n
\n \n
    \n
  • Enhancements/Changes\n
      \n
    • Updated many documentation examples and links
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-2977] Toggle field now fires change event when toggled or when the value is changed.
      • \n
    • Sunlight Labs has resolved the issue with our API calls to their servers therefore the GeoCongress demo now fully works again.
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3240] Changed default values of title + message in MessageBox to null
      • \n
    • Axis titles added to Charts
      • \n
    • Charts now handle padding configs given in objects
      • \n
    • Added \'stepped\' config for area/line chart
      • \n
    • Added Grouped bar chart
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3236] Changed the default modal config for Ext.Msg to `true`
      • \n
    • Improved Android 4 Scroll Indicator performance
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-1209] Enabled focus event firing on all devices that support it
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-2854] Added the paste and input events into the DOM event recognizer. Paste and dropdown selection will now trigger
      • \n
    • Improved cleanup of stores in a field Select upon destroy
      • \n
    • Improve label positioning in SVG
      • \n
    • Improve animation parser for charts
      • \n
    • fillOpacity/strokeOpacity are now handled properly during animations
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3281] Added valid modes documentation for tplWriteMode configuration of Component
      • \n
    • Added FlipXY configuration to cartesian charts. Simplifies bar to column conversion
      • \n
    • Optimized segment tree algorhythm for chart aggregation
      • \n
    • Added Candlestick and OHLC examples to kitchen sink
      • \n
    • Added webkitBackingStorePixelRatio support
      • \n
    • Added destroy check on updateLength method of Throttled Indicator
      • \n
    • Update Button SASS so it looks better on device
      • \n
    • Added some wrapping for Panel anchors, normalized icon names, no longer using transforms
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3361] Added lastUpdatedText configuration to PullToRefresh
      • \n
    • Added proper support for IE10 animateStartTime
      • \n
    • Updated TouchTweet to consume 50 records at a time
      • \n
    • Added cross zooming interaction to charts
      • \n
    • Added \'x-list-item-first\' and \'x-list-item-last\' to very first and very last List item (not in every group)
      • \n
    • Added new configuration options variableHeights, itemHeight and refreshHeightOnUpdate to List. All three allow you to configure the list to be much more performant if your list conforms to certain rules
      • \n
    \n
    • \n \n
  • Bug Fixes\n
      \n
    • [TOUCH-2794] Fixed an issue where passing a function as filter to the Store\'s filter method would cause an invalid Filter instance to be created
      • \n
    • Fixed issues that can arise when using syncRemovedRecords and destroyRemovedRecords
      • \n
    • Fixed issues with sizeDetection when items are destroyed
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3237] Fixed issue when trying to change zIndex of a destroyed component
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3238] Fixed issue when trying to setParent(null) on container
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3247] Fixed missing alias for \'auto\' layout
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3040] Fixed issues when the XML reader handles complex mapping
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3239] Fixed issue where the change event was not being fired for DatePicker
      • \n
    • Fixed canvas resizing problem
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3246] Fixed issue when calling record.set on a record belonging to a store that has been bound to a chart
      • \n
    • Fixed isLayout flag to abstract layout class
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-2977] Fixed issues with the `change` event in toggle field
      • \n
    • Fixed showBy orientation change
      • \n
    • Fixed layout issues with geocongress
      • \n
    • Fixed unwrapping issues with Card Layout
      • \n
    • Fixed range problem on stacked cartesian series
      • \n
    • Fixed bbox problem for some Draw cases
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3253] Fixed discrete layout on date axes from missing labels
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3254] Fixed minimum and maximum not changing dynamically on a chart axes
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3269] Fixed text on y-axis overlaps with axis for Android 2 devices
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3292] Fixed method recursion in JsonP abort method
      • \n
    • Fixed Android 4 square box webkit masking issues for buttons, tabs, dropdown indicators, and showBy panel anchors
      • \n
    • Fixed StoreManager dependency issue
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3293] Fixed grid clipping in charts
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3265] Fixed issue with setting a detailCard to null in NestedList
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3303] Fixed issue with hiding a component when adding it to a container as the active item
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3278] Fixed documentation for the CompositeElementLite add method
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3275] Fixed documentation for private methods in Video component
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3280] Fixed Ext.create documentation with an example that applies to Touch
      • \n
    • Fixed some destroying checks for Layout
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3294] Fixed issue with dock-body not having a default 100% height
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3343] Fixed hiding an item being added to a Card layout if it\'s inner index matched the activeItem index
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3341] Fixed Date Picker not firing the \'pick\' event. Also removed the \'slotpick\' event from tap as it is also being fired on scrollEnd
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3276] Fixed issue with SegmentedButton firing the toggle event when initially setting the pressed config
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3356] Fixed issue with -webkit-box-shaow being used instead of the box-shadow sass mixin. Changed all uses to the mixin
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3358] Fixed field Select drop down icons when a form is transformed on Android 4
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3116] Fixed issue with focus not being cleared when using a Select or DatePicker when another input is selected
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3357] Fixed issue with anchor tips not displaying properly on Android 4
      • \n
    • Fixed issues with SelectField when coming directly from a text input field
      • \n
    • Fixed checkmark selection on SelectField
      • \n

      • \n
    • Fixed zIndex Android issues for all tabs
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3393] Fixed BoxDock trying to unwrap to an element that is already destroyed
      • \n
    • Fixed tab bar\'s docking to packing logic when a padding configuration is specified
      • \n
    • Fixed some Draw text measurement issues
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3406] Fixed issue with deactivating and autoPause media components
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3401] Fixed list layout in O\'reilly example
      • \n
    • Fixed slider display on Android 2
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3250] Fixed chart axis line not being complete on column charts
      • \n
    \n
    • \n \n
  • Known Issues / Upcoming Changes\n
      \n
    • Kiva is currently using a static data set to reduce strain on their systems.
      • \n
    • The Kitchensink example is becoming too large to fit into an iPad1\'s limited memory.\n We may break out some examples due to this issue.
      • \n

\n Release Notes for Sencha Touch 2.1.0-b2\n

\n \n

\n Release Notes: Release Notes: August 7, 2012
\n Version Number: 2.1.0-b2\n

\n
\n

\n Thank you for all the feedback on the first release, this beta for Touch 2.1 is\n includes many performance enhancements to Layouts and DOM events as well as additional\n drawing and charting enhancements.\n

\n
\n \n
    \n
  • Enhancements/Changes\n
      \n
    • Added Area Chart
      • \n
    • Added Stacked Column Charts
      • \n
    • Added 3D Pie Chart
      • \n
    • Polar rotate interaction implemented
      • \n
    • Scatter chart performance improved and adjustments made for upcoming label support
      • \n
    • Painted event detection has been refactored for improved performance
      • \n
    • SizeMonitor refactored for improved performance
      • \n
    • Masks and Modals are now structured around the updated DOM structure
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3163] Templates will now ignore \'null\' when applying values
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3050] Added openURL function into the sencha device package to allow for opening urls
      • \n
    • TitleBar/Toolbar now have a default height instead of pure CSS
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3199] Added safeguard against pullHeight not being set in PullToRefresh
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3169] Added Ext.util.Offset, cleaned up some Region methods
      • \n
    \n
    • \n
  • Bug Fixes\n
      \n
    • [TOUCH-3164] Fixed getUsername typo in Ajax proxy
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-2991] Fixed default logger config to be false insead of \'no\'
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3076] Fixed xindex and xcount issues
      • \n
    • Fixed pan/zoom offset bug
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3183] Fixed issue with isGrouped method
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3181] Fixed issue with destroying a DataView with no store
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3171] Fixed issues with Store consuming an empty Array
      • \n
    • Fixed Canvas gradient opacity issues on Android devices
      • \n
    \n
  • Known Issues / Upcoming Changes\n
      \n
    • Kiva is currently using a static data set to reduce strain on their systems.
      • \n
    • The Kitchensink example is becoming too large to fit into an iPad1\'s limited memory.\n We may break out some examples due to this issue.
      • \n
    • The Draw/Chart implementation is incomplete and does not include the following:\n
        \n
      • Bar Chart implementation
        • \n
      • Grouped Chart implementations
        • \n
      • Gauge Chart implementation
        • \n
      • Radar Chart implementation
        • \n
      • Chart Legends
        • \n
      • Chart Labels
        • \n
      • Chart Highlighting
        • \n
      • Polar Chart interactions
        • \n
      • Icicle/TreeMap/Sunburst implementations
        • \n
      • Table based layout implementation (as opposed to CSS flex box based layout)
        • \n
      \n
      • \n
    • Card Layout performance enhancements
      • \n
    • New DataView/List implementation for large data sets
      • \n
    \n
    • \n

\n Release Notes for Sencha Touch 2.1.0-b1\n

\n \n

\n Release Notes: Release Notes: July 19, 2012
\n Version Number: 2.1.0-b1\n

\n
\n

\n This is the initial beta for Touch 2.1 which is focused on the new charting\n package as well as bug fixes. The charting package has had a major rewrite and includes SVG support\n on devices which can support it. Most devices perform faster with Canvas and will use that engine\n by default. We will be adding more charting types and other missing functionality in charts\n throughout the beta cycle. The next release will be more focused on performance enhancements\n with updates to the layouts and events.\n

\n \n
\n \n
    \n
  • Enhancements/Changes\n
      \n
    • Implemented SVG support for Draw
      • \n
    • Pathing rewritten to have better garbage collection considerations/caching and it is now it\'s own class
      • \n
    • Sprites are now optimized flyweight classes for primitives and composites
      • \n
    • Sprites are now drawn via a shared flyweight implementation
      • \n
    • Sprites now use Modifiers to handle animations and highlighting more robustly
      • \n
    • Data aggregation rewritten with multiple strategies in mind
      • \n
    • Sprites now use attribute configuration which can be used by the Modifiers
      • \n
    • Re-architected Charts to be vastly simpler to create custom charts via spriting (ie: 3d Column example)
      • \n
    • Charts no longer hide the axes when animating
      • \n
    • Draw animation package rewritten and is purely transition based
      • \n
    • Pan/Zoom redrawing is no longer faked via a CSS image but redrawn in real-time
      • \n
    • Added Candlestick chart
      • \n
    • Added OHLC chart
      • \n
    • Changed Pie chart open animation
      • \n
    • Added pseudo-3d Column chart custom example
      • \n
    • Updated Stock Market sample application with a live preview
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-2719] Deprecating increment in spinner field; renaming it to stepValue per the HTML5 input fields API
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-2800] Implemented new WebSQL proxy
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-2822] Added a getAllCount method to Store to get a full count including filtered records of the Store
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-2888] Changed the default zIndex in message box to a larger number to stop accidental zIndex issues when creating other floating panels/components
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-2928] Removed static properties of singleton Ext.data.JsonP
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-1568] Added rightButton config and rightbuttontap event to navigation bar
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-2816] NavigationView.pop can now use ComponentQuery
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-2418] Added pattern config to Fields
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-2818] Img components now center/stretch by default
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-2789] Container.setActiveItem can now use ComponentQuery
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-2480] Added allowToggle config to Button
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-2] Top docked tab bars can now have icons
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-2974] The setter method on associations now consistently return the instance
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-2942] Stores are now unregistered when you destroy them
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3031] Allow JS files to be specified as remote
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3012] Removed "this is a developer preview" from the whats new guide
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3042] Allow hideOnMaskTap to be changed dynamically
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3052] Fieldset will now disable all inner fields when the disabled config is called
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3052] Changed form panel to use config to change inner disabled field config
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3014] Removed the relationship between a NavigationView\'s card animation and its bar animation
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-2792] Implemented filters, sorters and paging into WebStorage proxy
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-2844] Optimized clear method on WebStorage Proxy
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3040] Improved XML reader to support more complex mapping strings
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-3064] Added a useCache configuration on Model. This can be set to false when having tree nodes exist in multiple trees
      • \n
    \n

\n Release Notes for Sencha Touch 2.0.1\n

\n \n

\n Release Notes: Release Notes: April 23, 2012
\n Version Number: 2.0.1\n

\n \n
\n

Special Notes:

\n

If you are using a LocalStorage proxy, from now on your Model\'s identifier strategy must generate unique id\'s.\n We suggest you use the included UUID strategy by adding identifier: \'uuid\' to your Model definition. Any existing\n Models you have saved to LocalStorage will need to have this added. A warning will be thrown for any Model configured\n with a LocalStorage proxy that doesn\'t have a unique id generating strategy.

\n

The change event in Ext.field.Select has been changed to return the new and old\n values and not records. This is to make it more consistent with all other form fields.

\n

The change event in Ext.field.Slider has been changed event now passes the Slider component

\n

Removed the default Ext.MessageBox requirement, added a proper error when Ext.Msg is used without Ext.MessageBox the requirement

\n

Refactored NavigationBar. NavigationBar now extends TitleBar and has ellipsis support. Animations in NavigationView on Android are now supported

\n

Optimized Card Layout with extra absolute position wrapper, improves performance in complex applications and when docking items to the left/right

\n

Implemented a new default ui for the radio field

\n

Revamped Command, removed all binaries (now reside in SDK Tools installations entirely)

\n
\n \n

  • Enhancements/Changes\n

    • Added timestamp to the URL of every request to burst the browser\'s cache
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-2365, TOUCH-1766] Changed local storage proxy to not generate id\'s for records. Instead it always uses the id defined on the record. This means that the model\'s identifier strategy has to generate unique id\'s when saving to local storage

    • [TOUCH-2674] Ext.layout.Card now uses this.cls + \'-container\' instead of a hard coded class name

\n Release Notes for Sencha Touch 2.0 FINAL\n

\n \n

\n Release Notes: Release Notes: March 6, 2012
\n Version Number: 2.0.0\n

\n \n
    \n
  • Enhancements/Changes\n
      \n
    • Disabled zebrastripes by default
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-2277] The Sheet/ActionSheet component no longer defaults to hidden: true
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-2287] Removed bad file from Carousel example
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-2290] Removed unnecessary call to hide a DatePicker before it is shown
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-2301] Added disclosureProperty configuration to List which allows per-record hiding of the\n disclosures\n
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-2315] Added background styling to fields and labels outside a fieldSet
      • \n
    • Added groupButtons config into spinner field which allows you to group the buttons to one side
      • \n
    • Added device.device API to receive information about the current device
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-2118] Add styling to horizontal list example and add it to the examples list
      • \n
    • Ext.app.Profile now uses the same dependency computation algorithm as Controller/Application
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-2310] Removed support for sending records over JSONP, as this should not be allowed
      • \n
    • Updated discloure icon in round ui lists
      • \n
    • Added device geolocation API
      • \n
    • Added neutral toolbar ui to touch
      • \n
    • Rename GeoLocation to Geolocation and adding alternate classname. adding frequency config to match\n W3C\n
      • \n
    \n
    • \n
  • Bug Fixes\n
      \n
    • [TOUCH-2279] Fixed issue with hideOnMaskTap: false not being respected for modals
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-2285] Fixed an issue in TreeStore that caused nodes with an empty children array to\n infinitely try and load those kids\n
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-2311] Fixed issue with itemConfig not being passed properly to DataItems in DataView with\n custom itemConfigs\n
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-2289] Fixed SliderField documentation error
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-2312] Fixed animation issue with NavigationView
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-2281] Fixed Proxy to properly require Batch, Operation and Model
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-2284] Fixed the load event to pass the operation as per the documentation
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-1224] Fixed issue with ToggleField returning an array
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-2325] Fixed field background color issue in toolbar fields
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-2332, TOUCH-2333] Fixed issue with destroyPickerOnHide and destroy method of DataPicker
      • \n
    • Fixed issues with the bodyPadding, bodyMargin and bodyBorder configs in panel, if the passed value\n is null\n
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-2319] Fixed Ext.Msg instance so it sets the configs back to original when #show\'d
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-2261] Fixed some issues related to reloading a TreeStore that is being used by a NestedList\n
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-2321] Fixed a problem where some association types would not get included when retrieving the\n data for a record\n
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-2322] Fixed Number field to allow for setValue(\'\')
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-2330] Fixed insertion of an item into a filtered Store Collection
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-2276] Fixed a problem where passing in record instances into the data property of a store\n would cause the field values to all be undefined\n
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-2224] Fixed an issue where the id was not properly sent along when setting writeAllFields to\n false on a Writer\n
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-2329] Fixed issue where Radio buttons were toggling incorrectly
      • \n
    • Fixed issue with number field not removing the clearIcon when used
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-2351] Fixed issue where a flyweight could cause an Ext.Element to get out of sync. Calling a\n flyweight on an existing element will now clear it\'s sync flag\n
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-2356] Fixed issue with repainting of a NavigationView during an orientation change
      • \n
    • [TOUCH-2363] Fixed NavigationBar so it properly destroys it\'s proxy at the end of it\'s lifecycle\n

    • [TOUCH-2362] Fixed issue with DataItem not updating it\'s record reference properly

    \n Release Notes for Sencha Touch 2.0.RC2\n

    \n \n

    \n Release Notes: Release Notes: February 28, 2012
    \n Version Number: 2.0.0.RC2\n

    \n \n
    \n

    Special Notes:

    \n \n

    The SASS $base-color in the default theme has been changed to Triton blue. If you want to continue to use the\n 1.x $base-color, you set it to `#354F6E` in your SASS theme file.

    \n
    \n \n
      \n
    • Enhancements/Changes\n
        \n
      • Updated base color to Triton blue
        • \n
      • Updated bottom tabs CSS design to not use alpha channel and improve performance
        • \n
      • $include-tab-highlights is now respected for bottom tabs
        • \n
      • Simplified default button/tab badge styling
        • \n
      • Added zebrastripe to list with a new $list-zebrastripe SASS configuration
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-2165] Added a margin to message boxes so they will not stick to the edge of the screen
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-2170] Added rounded corners on android devices on some examples
        • \n
      • Removed a call to remove a custom cls in onClick; instead, it will remove when you call #show\n again\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-2198] Removed desktop specific styling for fields in toolbars
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-2211] Updated the documentation for field.Field#reset
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-2225] Updated Operation to automatically match up a single created record, even when no\n clientId has been sent back\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-2233] Added \'itemsingletap\' event to DataView/List
        • \n
      • Updated documentation for triggerEvent
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-2234] Updated Nested List API example
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-2171] SizeMonitor will no longer fire a sizing event the first time it is added to a\n container\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-2247] Added support for empty headers in Lists
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-2189] Added initialOffset to Draggable. Fixed an issue with clearing the constraint of a\n draggable item\n
        • \n
      • Update Box layout docs to reflect proper CSS3 definition
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-2228] If you specify an Ext.Loader path for your application\'s namespace outside of\n Ext.application (and therefore do not use the appFolder configuration), appFolder no longer\n overwrites the mapping\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-2185] Trying to set the layout of a TabPanel to something that does not derive from a Card\n layout will now throw a hard error in debug mode\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-2217] Stores defined in Controllers are now instantiated automatically just like Stores\n defined in Ext.application\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-2242] Changed the logic of form#getValues slightly to allow for multiple values with the same\n name (saves as array) and the same for checkboxes and radio fields\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-2242] Added a getSubmitValue function into CheckBox fields so the form#getValues returns the\n correct value when there are multiple results\n
        • \n
      • Added a warning into ComponentManager#register so it warns developers if they create a component\n with an ID which already exists\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-2264] Removed all Ext.util.Observable internal uses
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-2252] Added a check for Facebook in os.Browser, as they change the userAgent
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-2257] Xml reader now accepts DOCUMENT_MODE (9) in addition to ELEMENT_NODE (1)
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-2103] Added support for reading an array using an Ajax proxy and an Array reader
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-2207] Updated Reader to not read undefined values
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-2248] Changed the fire change event on selectfield to only happen after initialization
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-2226] Improved client side association reference / store updating
        • \n
      \n
      • \n
    • Bug Fixes\n
        \n
      • [TOUCH-2182] Fixed problems with the routes in touch style app
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-2196] Fixed a bug with MessageBox where the configuration options were persistent when using\n Ext.Msg#show()\n
        • \n
      • Fixed Ext.mixin.Observable dependency in AbstractMixedCollection
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-2193] Fixed the logic for application icons with retina devices
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-2208] Fixed the defaultBackButtonText configuration of NavigationView to ensure it gets\n proxied to NavigationBar\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-2210] Fixed the docs for the change event in picker and datepicker
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-2210] Fixed the change event on pickers to only fire when the data changes
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-2205] Fixed a reference to this.el in MessageBox which was throwing a deprecation warning\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-2223] Fixed issue with Map not recognizing mapOptions passed in as a config
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-2229] Fixed syntax error in Ext.proxy.Direct
        • \n
      • Fixed exponential loop of doom in Selectable.deselectAll()
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-2231] Fixed two issues that prevented inverted instances of associations to be updated\n sometimes\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-2199] Fixed an issue where anyMatch and caseSensitive where not correctly passed along to the\n data.filter method\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-2215] Fixed unnecessary MixedCollection dependency in the Error class
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-2230] Fixed style config in component to use element.applyStyles so the old formats are\n available\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-2040] Fixed issue with animations which could throw an error
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-2204] Fixed synchronization issue with CompositeElementLite
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-2246] Fixed issue with dynamically setting emptyText on an empty list and the old emptyText\n component is now always removed when cleared or changed\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-2250] Fixed issue with DataView not respecting deferEmptyText when a store is added but not\n loaded on a DataView/List\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-2251] Fixed issue with destroying a translated item in a layout
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-2259] Fixed issue with setting a width of the left button in a TitleBar
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-2235] Fixed issue with Containers where the activeItem was still pointing to the last item in\n the container even after all items were removed\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-2237] Fixed an indexOf error with SegmentedButton when pressedButtons was not an array
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-2267] Fixed repaint issue on iOS when hiding components
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-2222] Fixed a issue with Picker where the set value was not being set if it wasn\'t already\n rendered\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-2135] Fixed issue with tapping multiple times on a mask while it is being animated
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-2227] Fixed an issue where the root was not properly extracted from the response data in\n Direct proxy and added Direct examples\n
        • \n
      • Fixed issue with setting the center property of mapOptions of Map before the map is on the screen\n
        • \n
      \n
      • \n
    • Known Issues\n
        \n
      • Android 4 transitions are hampered by a bug reported to\n the Android team. Help get its attention by starring the issue.\n
        • \n
      • \n Dealing with localstorage and associations

    \n Release Notes for Sencha Touch 2.0.RC\n

    \n \n

    \n Release Notes: Release Notes: February 21, 2012
    \n Version Number: 2.0.0.RC\n

    \n \n
      \n
    • Enhancements/Changes\n
        \n
      • Added inline config to DataView and List. This allows for horizontal scrolling lists and optionally\n wraps at the container\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1894] Implemented PollingProvider, DirectStore, and DirectProxy
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-2004] Added modifiedFieldNames and modifiedValues to the updaterecord signature in Store
        • \n
      • Added a ui: \'round\' to list to enable a rounded corner look to lists and grouped lists
        • \n
      • Added an isLoaded function to store
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-2025] Updated documentation on Video component
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-2028] Updated documentation to indicate showAnimation should use an inbound animation such as\n fadeIn/slideIn and hideAnimation should use an configuration such as fadeOut/slideOut\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-2029] Layout animations will now stop if interrupted
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-2024] Reverted forms back to use box layout from table layout
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1925] When using a Server Proxy with a JSON Reader, the Operation is now given the correct\n error state if invalid JSON is returned from the server\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-2046] Changed setting a default background to only effect card items
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-2009] Ext.Ajax no longer throws an error when calling abort. Instead it sets the request\n success state to false and aborts the request correctly\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-2026] Clarified build directory listing in the builds guide
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-2047] Removed the @accessor tags from the Ext.app.Application configs that are not changeable\n after boot (home screen icon settings and start up screen images)\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-2011] Changed card layout to not show the item when it is removed from the container IF it is\n being destroyed\n
        • \n
      • Added a warning to application if you try and include a controller that doesn\'t extend\n app.Controller\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-2054] Added a handleException method to DataView which will clear the LoadMask when a reader\n exception occurs. Users can override this method ago add custom error handling/alerts\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-2027] Allow date picker/picker/slot to accept for null values
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-2074] Added AJAX guide
        • \n
      • Added O\'Reilly example
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1474] Added TouchStyle example which includes an infinite scroller
        • \n
      • Updated NestedList to prevent interaction on selection once an item is selected
        • \n
      • Ext.application now sets the app\'s namespace before requires are processed. This means MyApp can\n requires:[\'MyApp.util.SomeClass\'], which previously was not possible\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-2099] Added a check for the change event in Select to ensure ti doesn\'t get fired when it\n hasn\'t changed\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-2084] Added an \'updatedata\' event to DataItem
        • \n
      • Geolocation will now throw a locationerror event if the devices which do not support Geolocation\n
        • \n
      • Moved models, views and stores configs from Application down to Controller
        • \n
      • Added support for "?breakpoint" for sencha-touch-debug.js when released
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-2077, TOUCH-2094] Improved initial viewport size detection on Android
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-2082] Implemented a withCredentials configuration on Ajax proxy to allow cross-origin\n resources\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-2082] Added ability to pass withCredentials to the Store#load method
        • \n
      • Added the ability for beforeHooks in mixins to return false to prevent the original function from\n being called\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1922] Implemented the ability to configure your reader and model definition using metaData in\n your response\n
        • \n
      • The default CSS ClassName for Button\'s press has been changed to \'x-button-pressing\' from\n \'x-button-pressed\'. \'x-button-pressed\' is now used when the button is pressed in a SegmentedButton.\n SegmentedButton now listens to its Button\'s tap event and results in a much better user experience\n
        • \n
      \n
      • \n
    • Bug Fixes\n

      • [TOUCH-1983] Fixed Android\'s lack of native ISO 8601 Date parsing support
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-2005] Fixed an issue that prevented Component DataView items to not be properly updated when\n changing a data field on a record\n
        • \n
      • Fixed a regression with maxRows in field/Input

        • \n
      • [TOUCH-2051] Fixed issue with programmatically setting active tabs
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1877] Fixed issue where ComponentQuery would no longer match against an Id if an itemId was\n set\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-2062] Fixed warnings on invalid dates to not display in production builds
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-2071] Fixed ComponentQuery to use proper getter methods instead of directly accessing\n properties when getters exist\n

        • \n

        • \n
      • Fixed Viewport \'resize\' event to use SizeMonitor and no longer use window.onresize for reliability\n on Android\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-2114] Fixed issue with checkbox\'s handling of [name=foor[bar]]
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-2098] Fixed setConfig() to not discard non-default-config values
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-2112] Fixed an issue with replacing an item in a Collection
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-2122] Fixed the Association creation code to handle custom types

    \n Release Notes for Sencha Touch 2.0.beta3\n

    \n \n

    \n Release Notes: Release Notes: February 13, 2012
    \n Version Number: 2.0.0.beta3\n

    \n \n
    \n

    Special Notes:

    \n \n

    Application dependency logic has been tweaked to allow more versatility in specifying dependencies from\n packages outside your application. As of this release any combination of local and external dependencies\n should be possible, but you\'ll need use Ext.Loader.setPath to specify where external dependencies can be\n found. See the updated Application\n class docs for sample usage.

    \n
    \n \n
      \n
    • Enhancements/Changes\n
        \n
      • Markup/SASS Optimizations\n
          \n
        • Fixed performance of button tap!
          • \n
        • Markup changed to be more table-like and not use flex-box
          • \n
        • Checkbox changed to use a picto with a webkit-mask
          • \n
        • Select dropdown images changed to use a picto with a webkit-mask
          • \n
        • Removed unnecessary overflow css as this is handled with a gradient
          • \n
        \n
        • \n
      • \n New Guides\n
          \n
        • Added a new guide on using floating components
          • \n
        • Added a new guide on Environment Detection
          • \n
        • Added a new guide on Views in MVC
          • \n
        • Added a new guide on Dependencies in MVC
          • \n
        \n
        • \n
      • Added support for Android Chrome Mobile
        • \n
      • Improvements to Pull To Refresh plugin - allows it to work simultaneously with ListPaging and not\n clobber the Store\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1833] Add a check for HTC_ in the userAgent for some weird\n devices that ship with an OSX useragent\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1817] Added a record configuration to Component to bind a Model to a tpl
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1805] Updated the carousel indicator to update on dragEnd to give faster feedback to the\n user\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1602] Improved the Readers to create a single data extractor function instead of accessors\n for each field\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1873] hideOnMaskTap now properly defaults to false
        • \n
      • Improved CSS for Scroller & Scroller Indicators
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1852] Removed the selected config from Selectable as this is not meant to be manipulated\n externally\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1818] Updated Translatable package to have the same consistent event signature with Scroller\n (x and y arguments separately instead of object with x and y properties)\n
        • \n
      • Improved Scroller package - Significantly reduced file size by migrating to use Translatable
        • \n
      • Refactored slot snapping feature for performance and accuracy
        • \n
      • Ext.scroller.Scroller changed from being a factory to the main implementation
        • \n
      • Updated Draggable to have consistent event signature with Scroller & Translatable (x & y arguments\n instead of 1 object)\n
        • \n
      • Added removeChild() to Element
        • \n
      • Renamed "ui" config to "indicatorsUi" for Indicators
        • \n
      • Added beforeInitConfig() template method, to be invoked right after all initGetters are in place,\n but right before all setters are called\n
        • \n
      • Cleaned up Container\'s modal-related methods, added onInnerItemMove template method
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1824] Updated the docs of TitleBar and Toolbar
        • \n
      • Cleaned up Ext.destroy() and improved Ext.deprecateClassMethod()
        • \n
      • Cleaned up Carousel to accomodate to changes in Translatable and be well abstracted for the Infinite\n implementation\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1786] Migrated to markdown, added namespaces into the Model definitions in the example code\n to avoid confusion as reported in the forums\n
        • \n
      • Added DomHelper support for browsers which lack the createContextualFragment method (WP7.5)
        • \n
      • Changed DomHelper applyStyles to use Element\'s applyStyles
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1855] Changed field set to just use CSS for styling the first and last items, removing JS\n
        • \n
      • Added a hiddenCls config to component
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1855] Removed js to add a cls to the first and last item in a field set. back to css\n :first-child & :last-child\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1844] Added a loading mask to nested list
        • \n
      • Update the docs for remoteSort and remoteFilter in Store so people know to call load() after you\n sort/filter\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1792] Updated the twitter example css so the tweet list toolbar is not super tall
        • \n
      • Changed to default config of Animation\'s \'preserveEndState\' to \'false\', \'replacePrevious\' to\n \'true\'\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1924] Clean up counter item in localstorage
        • \n
      • preventZooming is back to true by default. Other issues relating to using the Map component and\n anchor tags are resolved in this mode\n
        • \n
      • Un-deprecated callOverridden()
        • \n
      • Replaced all occurrences of console.* to Ext.Logger.*
        • \n
      • Allowed Controllers, Models, Views, Profiles and Stores to have the same name as their Application\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1923] ListPaging and PullToRefresh plugins only remove associated List\'s loading mask after\n first load\n
        • \n
      • Check for the existence of a Model instance after we get an id out of the data
        • \n
      • Cached regexs (regexes? regexi?) on Connection
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1945] Updated documentation for Map and remove GeoLocation from the KitchenSink example
        • \n
      • Updated docs so List does not inherit DataView\'s useComponents config options
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1793] Refactored the examples index
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1961] Changed the pressed state of buttons to be lighter
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1911] AJAX requests that time out now longer call the success callback, calls the failure\n instead\n
        • \n
      • Preliminary Ext.Direct support added. Note that PollingProvider, DirectStore, and DirectProxy will\n be coming in a later release\n
        • \n
      \n
      • \n
    • Bug Fixes\n
        \n
      • [TOUCH-1816] Fixed Carousel setActiveItem() not hiding unused decorators
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1846] Fixed the dark toolbar text color on the apple theme
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1860] Fixed issue with the Img component if it was destroyed before it was rendered
        • \n
      • Fixed use of getStore in DataView inline example
        • \n

        • \n

        • \n
      • Fixed issues when passing hide/show the improper arguments
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1771] Fixed Ext.dom.Element.applyStyles properly
        • \n
      • Fixed an issue with Model where if you had multiple associations, it would only add the last one\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1638] Fixed an issue with text fields where the clearIcon was not returning after it was\n hidden\n
        • \n
      • Fixed the coloring of text in android when there was only a placeholder
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1867] Fixed documentation bug in FormPanel
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1879] Fixed an issue where onProxyLoad would throw an error if the Proxy hadn\'t set any\n records on the Operation\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1837] Fixed and issue with Ext.app.Application where it would always call\n Ext.Loader.setPath(\'YourAppName\', \'app\'), even if Loader had already been given a path for the\n \'YourAppName\' namespace. Now it checks first and does not overwrite an existing mapping for your app\n namespace\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1862] Fixed WebStorage proxy to respect date fields dateFormat configuration when saving and\n reading data\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1881] Fixed routes in nested Controllers - Routes were previously not recognized in nested\n Controllers (e.g. MyApp.controller.nested.Name), now they are\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1868] Fixed DomHelper\'s createTemplate method
        • \n
      • Fixed a bug in navigation view where it added an empty backButton if the view didn\'t start with at\n least 1 item\n
        • \n
      • Fixed some examples to have the proper hideOnMaskTap value
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1875] Fixed issues related to passing in Ext.util.Filter instances into the filter method on\n Store\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1407] Fixed listener\'s format support for \'control\' config
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1864] Fixed MixedCollection to work with the new Ext.util.Filter class
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1735] Fixed the refresh logic in the kiva example so it loads all content when you press\n refresh after clearing the field\n
        • \n
      • Fixed a bug in data item where updateRecord was not checking for null
        • \n
      • Fixed the Model\'s copy method to properly remove the id from the data so that you don\'t get passed\n back the same record instance\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1827, TOUCH-1836] Fixed \'erased\' event not being fired when there are concurrent animations\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1850] Fixed HasOne association to automatically set the instance on the owner model when you\n call the association setter\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1876, TOUCH-1914] Fixed NestedList getTitleTextTpl and getItemTextTpl methods to work when\n not in compatibility mode\n
        • \n
      • Fixed issue when trying to show a Component that isn\'t rendered
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1918] Fixed problem in DataView when trying to change classes on items that have already been\n removed\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1901] Fixed a bug with date picker where if you disabled day/month/year fields, it would not\n generate a proper date\n
        • \n
      • Fixed an issue with picker slots where you could not scroll to the last item
        • \n
      • Fixed an issue with addCls where the same cls could be added twice
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1903] Fixed a bug where if you animated a card layout when it was not rendered, it would\n throw an error\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1912] Fixed styling for text area fields inside toolbars
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1926] Fixed a bug with navigation view when you pass an item with no text
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1928] Fixed issue with using Ext.repaint in non-compat mode
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1902] Fixed a bug with picker when you set the value when the picker is not rendered
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1575, TOUCH-1699, TOUCH-1822] Fixed issues caused by preventing \'touchstart\'
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1843] Fixed an issue where emptyText would not show on the DataView on the first load if the\n first load was empty\n
        • \n
      • Fixed YQL example
        • \n
      • Fixed a scope issue with Model#load and issues with multiple associations in a model
        • \n
      • Fixed Associations when you try and load an association\'s store when autoLoad is true

      • [TOUCH-1911] Ext.Ajax no longer errors when a timeout occurs
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1939] Fixed getPreviousItem in navigation view
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1938] Fixed an issue with event delegation where the target was always required to be beneath\n another target\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1502] Fixed TreeStore sorting to automatically sort any NodeStore\'s that use nodes from that\n TreeStore\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1942] Fixed a bug where you could not disable a tab item in a tabpanel
        • \n
      • Fixed a bug in Reader that prevented you from specifying fields directly on a TreeStore
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1891] Fixed an issue with XML reading that was caused by moving to a single extraction\n method\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1954] Fixed Selectable so it will no longer fire deselect events when refreshing it\'s\n selections based on a store refresh event\n
        • \n

      • [TOUCH-1960] Fixed the styling of disabled select fields within toolbars

      • Assosciations are not compatible with localstorage

      • Android 4 transitions are hampered by a bug reported to\n the Android team. Help get its attention by starring the issue.\n

    \n Release Notes for Sencha Touch 2.0.beta2\n

    \n \n

    \n Release Notes: Release Notes: February 8, 2012
    \n Version Number: 2.0.0.beta2\n

    \n \n
    \n

    Android 4 transitions are hampered by a bug reported to the Android team. Help get\n its attention by starring the issue.

    \n
    \n \n
    \n

    Notes:

    \n \n

    Navigation View has been updated so the \'stack\' is now based on the items config/collection. This\n means that if you define more than 1 item in a navigation view, the last item will always be the\n active item. The animation methods have also been removed from Navigaiton View. Instead, you should change\n the animation using the view.getLayout().setAnimation() setter instead, just like you would on a\n Ext.Container.

    \n \n

    The signature returned in the callback configuration of Ext.util.JSONP#request has changed.\n Previously it only returned the JSON object. It now returns the success value (Boolean) as the first\n argument and then the JSON object as the second argument. The class has also been deprecated

    \n \n

    The sencha-touch-debug.js shipped with Beta 2 now includes deprecated compatibility methods. Please remember\n that in order to use the smaller build without compatibility, you will need to fix any deprecation warnings\n you receive during development

    \n
    \n \n
      \n
    • Enhancements/Changes\n
        \n
      • Deprecated enterAnimation/exitAnimation in favor of showAnimation/hideAnimation as this is a more\n accurate description\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1400] Deprecated setRootNode and getRootNode methods.
        • \n
      • Deprecated hide node configuration on TreeStore
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1593, TOUCH-1591] Added warnings when adding listeners to deprecated events on Store
        • \n
      • Added deprecation warnings for Store sortOnLoad, filterOnLoad and sortOnFilter
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1605] Deprecated setOrientation, layoutOnOrientationChange, monitorOrientation,\n beforeorientationchange, and orientation change within component. Links added to Viewport where\n applicable. Warnings will now be thrown when using these old methods\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1627] Deprecated Container.cardSwitchAnimation
        • \n
      • Deprecated Component#getEl()
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1615] Added the old flip, cube, wipe animations to Anim. Removed the now unused Anim-more.js\n file\n
        • \n
      • Clarified docs on Application dependencies
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1550] Added styling for disabled and checked checkboxefield
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1639] Always hide the clear icon when you tap it
        • \n
      • Added a unit test to cover trailing slashes in Routes
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1424] Cleaned up instantiation on Card Animations. Passed config should now be properly\n passed to individual animations\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1710] Added emptyText configuration to the twitter example and custom styling for it
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1710] Added a check to the twitter example to ensure there is always at least one search
        • \n
      • Picker sheets are now hidden when navigating away using the browser back buttons
        • \n
      • Added more documentation for Ext.Button#ui
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1462] Updated picker to not use component query to find its children
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1719] Updated onProxyLoad method to not use the removeAll API when clearing the store on load\n as this caused an issue whenever autoSync was set to true\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1462] Added local variable in picker to reduce code
        • \n
      • Added backwards compatibility to Carousel isVertical and isHorizontal
        • \n
      • Added backwards compatibility for Carousel#prev
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1768] Ext.Store.isLoading now always returns a Boolean
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1767] Removed unused stylesheets directory
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1676] Updated the styling of nested loading and YQL examples in kitchensink
        • \n
      • Updated the styling of Kiva example
        • \n
      • Disable scrolling within DataView while its bound store is loading
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1743] Added styling for search fields outside toolbars
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1589] Added syncRemovedRecords config to Store that allows you to disable the synchronization\n of removed records in a Store\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1765] getRecord now returns undefined in WebStorage when the record cannot be found in the\n storage object\n
        • \n
      • Added a sortProperty configuration on the Grouper class. This allows you to sort the groups on\n something different then the returned group\n
        • \n
      • Added support for just passing \'data\' to a Store, and having it automatically create a Model based\n on the fields in the data\n
        • \n
      • Added margin to floating panels so they don\'t stick to the edge of the screen
        • \n
      • Disabled scrollable in the kiva example when there is an error in the response
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1701] Removed zIndex configuration from mask as it is automatically allocated now
        • \n
      • Added support for passing a function as argument to the Model.load method
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1543] Removed unnecessary prototype cacheConfig from List
        • \n
      • Updated the docs for some of the protected Proxy methods to indicate that you have to call the\n callback when you override them\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1373] Added support for the file:// protocol in Connection
        • \n
      • Added support for multiple source types for a video
        • \n
      • Improved listPaging/autoPaging behavior in the ListPaging plugin
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1756] Updated Class documentation to make it more clear on when developers may need to\n implement initConfig\n
        • \n
      • Store no longer automatically loads new data from the server after sorting or filtering when\n remoteSort/remoteFilter are set to true. Instead the user manually has to call the load methods\n
        • \n
      • Added scrollToTopOnRefresh option to DataView
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1082] Throw a warning when trying to add the render event
        • \n
      • Added an \'updatedata\' event to Component
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1797] List will now pass the event object to the disclosure handler so developers can stop\n the event\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1363] GPU-accelerate scrollers on Android 4 by default
        • \n
      • Ext.Viewport is now the default scope of onReady for convenience
        • \n
      • Removed inclusion of ScrollCover and ScrollReveal animations (Android) until they\'re properly\n implemented\n
        • \n
      • Changed Scroller factory to use CssTransform for all devices except Android 2 (Android 4.0.3 now\n performs as expected)\n
        • \n
      • Added a removeInnerItemAt method into container
        • \n
      • Store no longer sets the Proxy on it\'s Model if the Model doesn\'t have one defined itself
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1801] Added load and error events to the Img component
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1728] Slot center is now vertically aligned when titles are used
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1777] Added \'initialConfig\' for Scroller
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1802] Added listConfig option to NestedList to modify the sub-list configurations
        • \n
      • Allow Application-specified models, views, controllers, stores and profiles to take\n locally-qualified names and look in the local app folder first if they don\'t look like a custom\n namespace\n
        • \n
      • Added startup icons to navigation view example
        • \n
      • Added documentation for \'order\' in listeners
        • \n
      • Added some documentation to Selectable methods
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-470] Added a nested list guide
        • \n
      • Adjusted the logic for detection of a desktop to be more restrictive
        • \n
      • Added a First App guide
        • \n
      • Added a ui configuration to scrollviews so you can specify the color of scroll indicators
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1814] Added defaultPhonePickerConfig and defaultTabletPickerConfig configs into selectfield\n so allow customization of the picker\n
        • \n
      • Added back in the ability to specify configs directly on the prototypee of all classes in the Data\n package in the compat build\n
        • \n
      • Removed unnecesary vbox layouts from FieldSet and FormPanel to improve performance
        • \n
      \n
      • \n
    \n
      \n
    • Bug Fixes\n
        \n
      • Fixed the change event in sliderfield to return the thumb that was moved and the new value
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1751] Fixed Ext.MessageBox#onClick method to use the returned buttons config.userConfig
        • \n
      • Source overlay is now hidden when hitting device back button
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-285] Fixed styling of pull to refresh plugin on Android 4
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1720] Fixed an issue where Selectable instantiated it own store
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1750] Fixed an issue in the removeAll method on Store
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1710] Fixed a bug in data view where the emptyText was not being hide when adding a new\n store\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1752] Fixed Ext.dom.Query select method to properly read the attribute values from nodes
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1755] Fixed an issue with MessageBox where if you showed another alert inside the callback,\n it would not work\n
        • \n
      • Fixed an issue in the save method on Model that would cause null to be passed as the first argument\n to the callback\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1758] Fixed min, max, sum and average methods on Store
        • \n
      • Fixed documentation for HasOne associations in the data package
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1675] Fixed issue with suspending automatic Geolocation and allow the Traffic plugin to work\n on Maps that have already been created\n
        • \n
      • Fixed documentation for Ext.Img#setSrc
        • \n
      • Fixed documentation issues with getting started guide
        • \n
      • Fixed styling issues with the JSON example in kitchensink
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-834] Fixed source overlay regex for removing HTML tags in kitchensink example
        • \n
      • Fixed detection of pressed buttons in the Map example
        • \n
      • Fixed Reader#rootProperty docs
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1426] Fixed Map repaint issue when the Map is resized within a hidden container
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1771] Fixed applyStyles error and cleaned up some regex caching
        • \n
      • Fixed an issue where the map was not displaying properly in the information popup
        • \n
      • Fixed a bug in FormPanel where the container items were not using the getter
        • \n
      • Fixed a bug with reading associated data through an XML reader
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1700] Fixed issue with LoadMask in a scrollable container (dataview, list)
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1770] Fixed the SessionStorage proxy
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1779] Fixed Sheet\'s enter and exit options when using \'right\'
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1779] Fixed a bug with Button where drag was calling release multiple times
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1565] Fixed the error message that is being thrown when defining a non-existing model on a\n Store\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1781] Fixed issues with merging in platform classes
        • \n
      • Fixed sorting on a Component based DataView, Element based DataView
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1717] Fixed NestedList to work properly with new TreeStore events
        • \n
      • Fixed documentation for Ext.Map deprecated members
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1790] Fixed the getById method on Store to not do a strict equal check
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1734] Fixed Video playback on Android 4
        • \n
      • Fixed Reader\'s parsing of totalProperty - this is now set to null if a total was not explicitly sent\n back by the server\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1097] Fixed scrolling left from map carousel showing repayment schedule screen
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1797] Fixed issues which prevented element events from firing in the correct order (bubble\n up)\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1803] Fixed a 1px positioning issue with grouped list headers
        • \n
      • Fixed a bug where creating two copies of a TreeStore, the root property accessor wouldn\'t be\n properly set on the Reader of the second TreeStore\n
        • \n
      • Fixed an issue where the parent class updateProxy wasn\'t called in TreeStore. This caused the proxy\n to not have a model defined yet when it was building the extractors\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1810] Fixed issue with pausing inline video caused the video to stop on iOS
        • \n
      • Fixed issue with Ext.app.Action so that it now uses the Profile namespace correctly to find a\n controller. Previously it had been incorrectly using the Profile name config, instead of the\n namespace config\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1816] Fixed Carousel setActiveItem() not hiding unused items
        • \n
      • Fixed XML Writer
        • \n
      • Fixed a bug where an assosciation\'s inverse wouldn\'t properly be found for an association
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1834] Fixed initialize method in Segmented Button to call callParent()
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1840] Fixed the check in Ext-more for PhoneGap to also check if it is *not* desktop when\n adding the listener. This means if you include phonegap.js and run on the desktop, it will still\n launch\n
        • \n
      \n
      • \n
    \n
      \n
    • Known Issues\n
        \n
      • The Chrome Mobile beta was just released this week. We expect to have proper detection and\n implementation beginning with the next release.\n
        • \n
      • There is an issue witht he snapping the last item on Picker lists
        • \n
      • Assosciations are not compatible with localstorage
        • \n
      • WebStorage id are not in sync with Model\'s identifier strategy
        • \n
      • Android 4 transitions are hampered by a bug reported to\n the Android team. Help get its attention by starring the issue.\n
        • \n
      • Styling of the alignTo pointer and padding of the overlay are not quite correct yet
        • \n
