    \n Release Notes for Sencha Touch 2.0.beta1\n

    \n \n

    \n Release Notes: Release Notes: February 1, 2012
    \n Version Number: 2.0.0.beta1\n

    \n \n
    \n

    \n Note: if you have been using the preview Preview Release builds of Sencha Touch, be aware that B1\n ships with an updated set of built JavaScript files. There are now five builds in total, all of which are\n described in the builds and building guide.\n

    \n \n

    As of beta 1 most people will need to update their PRx app to use sencha-touch-debug.js while developing,\n then switch to sencha-touch.js in production.

    \n
    \n \n
      \n
    • Enhancements/Changes\n
        \n
      • Viewport autoMaximize is now false by default
        • \n
      • Implemented \'resize\' event. For the best performance, use this only when you absolutely need to\n monitor a Component\'s size.. This replaces the need to manually use Ext.util.SizeMonitor\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-945] Added an img xtype into Ext.Img
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-785] Cleaned up TouchEvents example in Kitchen Sink, added docs for deprecated events
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1218] Added getDockedItems and getDockedComponent methods back into Ext.Container
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1415] Added a usePicker configuration to selectfield which defaults to \'auto\' (which is then\n converted to true if it is a phone). Making the showPicker method public and adding some\n documentation\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1469] Using a store in a DataView that doesn\'t exist now throws a warning
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1475] Added docs for phoneStartupScreen and tabletStartupScreen
        • \n
      • Updated the documentation for flex in component
        • \n
      • Added deprecated getController to Ext.app.Controller
        • \n
      • Allow Ext.data.Connection to add credentials to a CORS request
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1516] Deprecated ptype
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1147] Removed cruft from examples directory
        • \n
      • Application#getController will now find non-profile specific controllers if a profile controller\n does not exist\n
        • \n
      • Application no longer overrides a preconfigured Store ID when stores are specified via the\n Application stores config option\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1450] Added hideKeyboard to datepickerfield when you show the picker
        • \n
      • Added \'initialize\' event for Component
        • \n
      • Added ComponentSize publisher which provide \'resize\' events for any Component when there\'s at least\n one listener\n
        • \n
      • Put back some the find and filter methods on Store
        • \n
      • Made the Model constructor work without passing an empty config object
        • \n
      • Added documentation for preventZooming and Ext.Viewport
        • \n
      • Added docs that explain that you have to define the model when creating an Operation directly
        • \n
      • Added back docs for model.idProperty
        • \n
      • Automatically change the field type of the id field to \'auto\' if its set to anything else
        • \n
      • Added @accessor to Profile namespace config
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1533] Updated the video standalone example
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1577] Added the ability to set the value of a datepickerfield to null
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1524] Added doBoxRemove to titlbebar
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1521] adding some missing methods to scroller and ensuring all documentation for scroller,\n container#scroller and related classes are sufficient\n
        • \n
      • Changed Data Field\'s useNull to allowNull and make the default true
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1595] Implememnted iconCls in messagebox
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1523] Added a default search to the Twitter example
        • \n
      • Gave MVC a lot more flexibility when specifying models, stores, controllers, views and profiles to\n load in an app\n
        • \n
      • Added a warning when passing an array to Controller\'s refs config
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1555] Added pop(count) methods to navigationbar
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1634] Allowed access to the map instance before it is added into the dom proper. Call\n doResize instead of renderMap when painted first time\n
        • \n
      • Improvemented backwards compatibility support, chiefly in MVC
        • \n
      • Added an enablePagingParams configuration to Proxy
        • \n
      • Fixed Cover/Reveal/Pop/Fade/Flip in animations in iOS. Android will change these to slide
        • \n
      • Writer is now allowed to only write the changes and still respect the persist property on fields\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1114] The spinner field \'field\' is now disabled so you cannot actually tap and modify it
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1535] The Ext.Msg singleton is now available by default
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1607] Added Ext.Element#fly into element
        • \n
      • Data Types now handles unparseable dates by throwing a warning instead of failing silently
        • \n
      • Controller launch functions are now called at app launch
        • \n
      • Implemented model erase functionality
        • \n
      • JSON reader now properly fires exception events
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1657] Changed the form clear icon to be an image
        • \n
      • Migrated Twitter to use new MVC
        • \n
      • Removed unnecessary kitchen sink overrides
        • \n
      • Added an isAutoLoading method
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1141, TOUCH-1548] Added animation to hide and show. Add enterAnimation/exitAnimation support\n to MessageBox\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1294] Added backwards compat for overlay config
        • \n
      • Improved Controller before filters API. Now any number of filters can be called in order
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1404] Added capability to toolbar to allow docked left and right
        • \n
      • Application now loads all dependencies for all Profiles, only adds Controllers, Models, Stores and\n Views for the current Profile to the Application\'s MVC\'s config\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1540] Removal of an item from a CardLayout will now work with animation
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1673] Added an animateActiveItem method to allow for a one time cardswitch animation
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1529] Updated the getting_started example
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1551] Added beforeInitialize method
        • \n
      • Kitchensink Animation example now uses correct animations on all devices
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1679] Removed the hide keyboard functionality from selectfield as it is causing issues
        • \n
      \n
      • \n
    \n
      \n
    • Bug Fixes\n
        \n
      • [TOUCH-1231] Fixed passing \'id\' from config not to be removed from the original object
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1213] Fixed an issue where x-button-small styling was not more important that toolbar button\n styling therefore making custom UIs not work\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1426] Fixed an issue with Ext.Map when re-orientation happens while the map is not visible\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1411] Fixed the styling of fields inside a toolbar, and disabled fields
        • \n
      • Fixed home screen icons on Android
        • \n
      • Fixed memory leak with innerHtmlElement of Components
        • \n
      • Fixed memory leak and issues with wrong subscriber length counting
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1099] Fixed masking in form.Panel. Removing a few unnecessary configurations now we have\n Masking at a container level. Cleaned up the docs\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1418] Fixed slide animation from overwriting opacity and zIndex
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1378] Fixed the masking functionality of Map
        • \n
      • Fixed an issue with id given in the default class config
        • \n
      • Fixed signature of the destroy event in Observable
        • \n
      • Fixed support for XML reading
        • \n
      • Fixed documentation for Model
        • \n
      • Fixed default of having a Json writer in JsonStore
        • \n
      • Fixed the docs to correctly tell the user what to change the pageParam, limitParam, startParam and\n groupParam to if they want to disable them\n
        • \n
      • Fixed an issue with replacing an item in Collection breaking indices and map object
        • \n
      • Fixed a bug in the replace function of Collection
        • \n
      • Fixed iffue with searchfield focus when setWidth() is called
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1358] Fixed centering a load mask when used in a scrollable container
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1539] Fixed issue with navigaitonbar where the button width is trying to be set when the\n button is not rendered\n
        • \n
      • Fixed Model.load to automatically set itself as the model on the operation. Also update the model on\n proxy in Store when you define a new one\n
        • \n
      • Fixed a bug in Profile namespace config default
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1580] Fixed pressedDelay: true for Buttons
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1536] You can no longer drag a slider field when it is disabled
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1536] Fixed disabled styling of sliders
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1562] Fixed NavigationView.pop event passing the incorrect view
        • \n
      • Fixed an issue with replaceCls in component if you

passed a null cls\n

    \n Release Notes for Sencha Touch 2.0.pr4\n

    \n \n

    \n Release Notes: Release Notes: January 23, 2012
    \n Version Number: 2.0.0.pr4\n

    \n
      \n
    • Enhancements/Changes\n
        \n
      • Added 7 new guides, including a 1.x -> 2.x Migration Guide\n
        • \n
      • Data refactored:\n
          \n
        • The data packed now makes full use of the config system and we recommend that configs be\n used with the data package as with the rest of your applications.\n
          • \n
        • The performance of the data package has been signifigantly improved.
          • \n
        • There are some event changes in the Data package and backwards compatibility for the old add,\n update,\n and remove events is not fully in place. The old events have severe performance implications and\n we strongly recommend all developers change to the new addrecords, updaterecord, and\n removerecords.\n In addition we have added a new \'refresh event\' to supplant the old \'datachanged event\' which\n was\n fired under too many circumstances.\n
          • \n
        • Many issues with LocalStore/WebStore are resolved and this should now work properly.\n Please note that assosciated local stores are not in place yet.\n
          • \n
        • Store paging is back in place and operational.
          • \n
        \n
        • \n
      • MVC refactored:\n
          \n
        • All MVC classes now consolidated under the Ext.app.* namespace
          • \n
        • All classes now use the 2.x class and config system
          • \n
        • Routes can now be defined on Controllers
          • \n
        • The Router from 1.x has been reinstated
          • \n
        • Device Profiles are now able to load their own dependencies if activated
          • \n
        • \n Added 3 new guides - Intro to apps,\n Controllers and Device\n Profiles\n
          • \n
        • Kitchen Sink updated to use device profiles, history and deep linking support
          • \n
        \n
        • \n
      • ComponentView refactored:\n
          \n
        • ComponentView is now fully integrated into DataView and it turned on by using the useComponents:\n true flag as a configuration option\n
          • \n
        • The event signatures for DataView have been changed to handle both Element based items and\n Component based items. In addition the record is now passed on all the item events.\n
          • \n
        \n
        • \n
      • Event signature cleanup: We are standardizing events to pass their scope as their first argument The\n following events have been updated in this release:\n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n \n

        • \n

      • [TOUCH-7] Added some extra documentation for UI config of tabpanel

      • [TOUCH-1362] Made useTitleForBackButtonText in navigation view actually mean use the title for the back\n button text\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1203] Changed emptyText to be a component in DataView instead of in the DataView\'s container
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1350] Added a special check to the ui config in Button. checks if it is {ui}-back or -forward,\n and if it is, it splits it and adds two uis. so \'decline-back\' would actually add both the decline, and\n back, ui classNames. getUi has been updates to accommodate this so the original UI is always returned\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1323] Deprecated \'locked\' config in Selectable. Introduced the more clear disableSelection
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1389] Added appFolder config back in

        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1208] Implemented Ext.copyTo in Sencha Touch
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1199] Removed \'values\' configuration from slider field and slider component as it is just a\n duplicate of \'value\'\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1093] Removed the default height of pickers in select field (200px) and moving it to CSS
        • \n
      • Removed disclosure config as it has been deprecated since 0.99. onItemDisclosure is now the only\n disclosure config\n
        • \n
      • Adding deprecation messages for promptConfig in Ext.MessageBox
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1310] Form panel now uses baseCls insead of cls
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-926] Changed GeoLocation to use getCurrentPosition instead of watchPosition due to a serious bug\n in iOS5.\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1079] Removed deprecation warning from \'hide\' and \'show\' events
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1386] Changed docs for the title configuration of navigation bar to tell people not to use it\n directly\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1225] Updated docs for spinner class, fixing issues with increment , minvalue and maxvalue\n configurations not working, making cycle configuration work\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1392] Changed the bar in picker to be a Toolbar now a TitleBar, as titlebar is not made to work\n with lots of items\n
        • \n
      • Added default implementation of getBubbleTarget for Component, which returns its parent
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1038, TOUCH-822] Changed default preventZooming of the Viewport to false. This allows for Map\n controls and links to work\n

        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1318] Removed Ext.Direct from Touch as it was added in PR3 by accident
        • \n

        • \n

      • x-list-inner now has a width of 100% so text-overflow: ellipsis works

        • \n
      • Updated ListPaging plugin

    • Known Issues\n
        \n
      • Some animations are still not in place and will be added in a forthcoming release
        • \n
      • Android 3/4 and Blackberry optimizations are not yet in place
        • \n
      • The non-backwards-compatible version of Sencha Touch is not yet in place
        • \n
      • Audio and Video components are not working properly on all supported devices
        • \n
      • Fields in a Toolbar on Android have some display issues
        • \n
      • Overlay and ShowBy are not fully implemented

    \n Release Notes for Sencha Touch 2.0.pr3\n

    \n \n

    \n Release Notes: Release Notes: December 9, 2011
    \n Version Number: 2.0.0.pr3\n

    \n
      \n
    • Enhancements\n
        \n
      • Carousel refactored:\n
          \n
        • Carousel example rewritten, this is now a carousel of carousels each separate carousel has a\n set of 10 themed images (Food, Animals, Cars, Architecture)\n
          • \n
        • Carousel animations are back in place
          • \n
        • Native-like behaviors for both dragging and flicking
          • \n
        • Now removes unused items from the DOM automatically to support large carousels
          • \n
        \n
        • \n
      • NavigationView added (name subject to change): A stack based view which allows you to push views\n onto the \'stack\' at anytime. The view will automatically handle the animation of the title and the\n back button (when you have stack with more than one item).\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-962] List.setGrouped() can now be set dynamically
        • \n
      • Added tap event to Img component
        • \n
      • Added decimal formatting to spinner
        • \n
      • Fullscreen deprecation warning removed
        • \n
      • Documentation for all events have been added
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1055] Added base Mask and LoadMask components. Added mask config to container
        • \n
      • Added some convenience styling for item headers and footers. Should allow for easy rounded corners\n
        • \n
      • Proper backwards compatibility added for \'dock\' vs \'docked\' in Containers
        • \n
      • Added flashIndicator methods to scrollview and scrollTo end methods to scroller
        • \n
      • NavigationBar renamed to TitleBar
        • \n
      • Updated Map plugins GmapTracker and GmapTraffic
        • \n
      • Swapped the order of "deactivate" and "activate" events
        • \n
      • Added Component Translatable behavior
        • \n
      • Added minPosition to scroller Abstract (counterpart to maxPosition)
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-131] Added $form-label-background-color for styling the form label background color
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1129] Added Ext.Viewport.hideKeyboard method to force the keyboard to be removed from the\n screen in iOS\n
        • \n
      \n
      • \n
    \n
      \n
    • Bug Fixes\n
        \n
      • Fix issue where modal components were trying to remove a cls from a dom, after it was removed.
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-811] Fixed tapping on HashTags on the iPad1
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-812] Fixed tapping on links on the iPad1
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-888] Added bodyPadding, bodyMargin and bodyBorder methods into Ext.Panel
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-427] Fixed MessageBox not resizing based on message content
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1033] readOnly fields will no longer show a clearIcon
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-818] Nested List example: In the detail view, the padding was moved so it will not affect the\n scrollbar\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-829] Twitter example no longer displays a blank field in search items for empty searches
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1032] Fixed Tab Panel crashing when no items are present. Also fix animation direction of\n tabs.\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1043] Fixed issue with update which ensures listeners and eventBubble are processed first\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1027] Fixed issues with emptyText on DataView/List
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1023] Fixed Ext.field.Select to allow for remote stores
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-814] Ajax example now displays a loading mask
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-520] Removed Guide example
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1030] Fixed issue with Map rendering before the dom is painted
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-753] Map added back to Kiva example
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1041] Forced styleHtmlContent to a boolean
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-808] Added completion amount to Kiva example
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1044] Fixed issues with floating items within a fit layout
        • \n
      • Fixed scrolling body on desktop
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1053] Fix an issue when container with a tpl and scrollable
        • \n
      • Replaced alias with xtype in class definitions, reduced code using proxyConfig
        • \n
      • Added Translatable and its implementations, refactored Draggable to use Translatable
        • \n
      • Refactored Slider / Thumb / Toggle to work with new version of Draggable
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-989] Reset scroll position when refresh is called. In addition, removed itemIndex property\n from the dom as it was not maintained when changes to the store changed the index. Instead the\n getViewItems now returns a proper array and indexOf is used\n
        • \n
      • Fixed a bug with card show events being called twice
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1054] Fixed issue with defaults: {hidden:true} in NavigationBar
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1061] Call parent method of initialize in Button
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1074] Fix issue with select/deselect when called with an index
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1073] Fix recursive method call when abort is called with JSONP
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1057] Set default labelAlign to left
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1057/1052] Fixed label align issues, and rounded corner issues with fieldset
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1046] Fixed various issues with Map.mapOptions. Deprecated the update method as it conflicts\n with the base Component update. This is now setMapCenter as that is what \'update\' actually does.\n Remove the now unused onUpdate method\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1072] Fixed a small issue with floating items inside containers
        • \n
      • Added animation to Translatable, integrated into Slider
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1090] Fixed issues with Nested Loading example in KitchenSink. Added emptyText config as\n well\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-501] Fixed CSS styling within google maps
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-954] Changed deprecated createDelegate to bind in GeoLocation
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-916] Deprecated useClearIcon in favor of clearIcon
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1139] Put plugins support back in
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-739] Map example updated and working properly
        • \n
      • Fixed a bug with Picker where it removed all items, not just slots
        • \n
      • Fixed TabBar configuration issues with TabPanel
        • \n
      • Fixed a config issue with tabBarPosition
        • \n
      • Fixed Format.date
        • \n
      • Move plugins to proper directory and fix namespaces. Remove plugins from ignore.
        • \n
      • Fixed an issue with AbstractScroller scrollToEnd methods
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1173] Fixed some timeout issues when destroying a button
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1183] load/filter/sort events will now refresh the selections on a list
        • \n
      • Fix issues relating to the browser not passing TouchEnd events under stress. Touch can now recover\n from this gracefully\n
        • \n
      • Re-enable pull to refresh - not complete, styling needs to be updated
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1187] Fixed problem with setting a DatePicker to null
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1212] clearIcontap now fires the change event
        • \n
      \n
      • \n
    \n
      \n
    • Known Issues\n
        \n
      • Updated MVC with Routing/History/Deep Linking/Profiles will be in the next release
        • \n
      • The Data package currently cannot yet be configured by passing \'config\' parameters. This will be\n implemented in the next release.\n
        • \n
      • Some animations are still not in place and will be added in a forthcoming release
        • \n
      • Android 3 and Blackberry optimizations are not yet in place
        • \n
      • We are standardizing all events to pass their scope as their first argument. This will affect 40\n Events and will be put in place in the next release. When implemented we will provide full\n documentation for all the events affected by this change.\n
        • \n
      \n
      • \n

    \n Release Notes for Sencha Touch 2.0.pr2\n

    \n \n

    \n Release Notes: Release Notes: November 10, 2011
    \n Version Number: 2.0.0.pr2\n

    \n \n

    \n New In This Release\n

    \n
      \n
    • Enhancements\n
        \n
      • Forms have been refactored to be less component heavy for better performance
        • \n
      • Added Android native packaging guide
        • \n
      • contentEl has been re-implemented on Components
        • \n
      • Updated documentation for autoCreateViewport to clarify how it works
        • \n
      • listeners and bubbleEvents config options and now guarenteed run prior to other configurations
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-930] DataView and List now use proper getters when retrieving data from their Store
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-775] Developer calls to Store.loadRecords will now fire \'clear\' and \'add\' events when\n appropriate\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-831] Added a \'sort\' event to Store
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-842] Added a \'filter\' event to Store
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-908] Added emptyText support to DataView/List
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-792] Completed Map class refactor
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-793] Completed Geolocation class refactor
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-928] Include jsb3 file in the distribution
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-22] If a component\'s \'html\' property is set, it will default \'styleHtmlContent\' to true
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-802] TextArea icon is now top aligned
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-859] readOnly attribute added to fields
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-927] Deprecate html in Button in favor of badgeText
        • \n
      \n
      • \n
    • Bugs Fixes\n
        \n
      • [TOUCH-763] Fix issue where SegmentedButton was not firing painted events
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-763] Fix issue where TabBar was not firing painted events
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-845] Fix persistent scrollbar issue in Safari 5.x desktop
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-849] Fix issue with activeItem configuration not being respected
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-468] Fix the inability to pull attributes out of XML nodes
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-841] Fix issue when inserting data into a store where List would throw an error
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-931] Fix issues with multiselect and deselect within Selectable
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-831] Fix issue when sorting a DataView/List by using the new \'sort\' event on Store
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-842] Fix issue when filtering a DataView/List by using the new \'filter\' event on Store
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-543] Fix issue where beforeselect event was not being fired on Selectable
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-961] Fix issue with group headers not updating properly when the store changes
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-893] Fix issue with multiple fields with the name inside a formpanel
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-992] Fix setValue issue with numberfield and selectfield
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-932] Fix issues with Ext.select
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-836] Fix issue with Picker overflow which was causing alignment problems
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-920] Aliased Ext.log to Ext.Logger.log to fix issues with shared platform code
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-977] Fix segmented button styling issues
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-982] Fix incorrect return type in setGroupValue for radio fields
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-974] Fix Container.getComponent to use itemId
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-986] Fix textfield focus
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-903] Add documentation for the painted and erased events
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-832] Allow Carousel to be destroyed without throwing errors
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-996] Fix issues related to dynamically adding items to an empty carousel
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-987] Fix issues related to List headers when sorting or otherwise updating data
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-567] Fix form layout issue
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-592] Fix issue with scrubber on Android 3
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-654] Fix not being able to tap on a dropdown icon/arrow
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-768] Fix issue when entering non-numeric values in numberfield
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-800] Fix issue where the clearIcon was not properly centered on an iPad
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-803] Fix issues with numberfield.reset()
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-860] Fix listener return signature
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-881] Fix issue with Form submission
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-889] Fix issue with removing FieldSets
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-890] Fix selectfield \'default\' configuration
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-893] Fix form.getValues() when inner content has been modified
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-896] Fix problem with Checkbox/Radio event firing
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-922] Fix formPanel.setRecord() selectfield and numberfield
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-924] Fix form submission callback
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-929] Fix innverted check/uncheck event firing
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-936] Fix firing of the togglefield change event
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-940] Fix incorrect event signature on SegmentedButton
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-958] Fix radiofield getValue
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-963] Fix focus of textarea when enter is pressed
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-964] Fix Model field truthy defaultValue to allow reading non-truthy value
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-974] Allow setPressed to work with itemId
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-976] Fix Form.disable() crash on sliderfields
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-977] Fix SegmentedButton rounding when segments are hidden
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-978] Fix formPanel submission exception
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-805] Fix issue in SegmentedButton where you could use two fingers to select multiple buttons\n when allowMultiple was false\n
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-1006] Fix disabled SegmentedButton
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-887] Fix iconAlign in Button
        • \n
      • [TOUCH-874] Fix issue of a Button loosing listener if another button is created after it
        • \n
      • Fix documented types of Ext.Component#html and #contentEl
        • \n
      • Add missing constructor to example in class system guide
        • \n
      • Fix Ext.Msg.alert call in class system guide
        • \n
      • Fix error when destroying SizeMonitor detectors if the monitored element had already been removed\n
        • \n
      \n
      • \n
    • Known Issues\n
        \n
      • Updated MVC with Routing/History/Deep Linking/Profiles will be in a forthcoming release
        • \n
      • The Data package currently cannot yet be configured by passing \'config\' parameters. This will be\n fixed in an forthcoming release.\n
        • \n
      • Draggable is not yet implemented yet, this affects carousel scrolling and animations
        • \n
      • Some animations are still not in place and will be added in a forthcoming release
        • \n
      • Android 3 and Blackberry optimizations are not yet in place
        • \n
      \n
      • \n
